tweet: Hey, I need only 18 more Twitter followers to hit my goal of 3000.  Would love some help getting there.  Please recommend some friends! Thx.
I think we screened over 25 films at our screening series this year, but now's time for a hiatus.  We hope to come back in 2010 refreshed.
I love the NYC production community.  I have been asking a lot of questions (not publicly) and everyone chimes in with good input. THANKS!
Hey NYC Indie Filmmakers -- NOW is your chance.  Jon Reiss is spkg at IFC Ctr Tues 6P on the how to of the New Model. http://bit.ly/3m2cym
Sarah "Disturbing The Universe" Kunstler is offering group discounts,  special Q&A w/ filmmakers &/or specl guests for large# tix buyers.
